hero.headline: Professional Cleaning Services You Can Trust
hero.subtext: Based in Sarasota, Daxia Clean provides residential and commercial cleaning with eco-friendly products, meticulous attention to detail, and guaranteed punctuality.

services.description: Comprehensive services for homes: bathrooms, kitchens, living rooms, and more.

services.title: Commercial Cleaning
services.description: Spotless offices, stores, and corporate spaces.

services.title: Window Cleaning
services.description: Crystal-clear glass, free of spots and streaks.

services.title: Deep Cleaning
services.description: Complete disinfection and detailing for an extreme clean.

services.title: Bathroom Cleaning
services.description: Guaranteed hygiene in bathrooms and restrooms.

services.title: Carpet Vacuuming
services.description: Thorough removal of dust, mites, and embedded dirt.

services.title: Eco-Friendly Cleaning

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.headline: Exceptional Cleaning, Every Time
whyChooseUs.description: At Daxia Clean, we provide professional cleaning services in Sarasota, ensuring spotless homes and businesses with personalized care and unmatched attention to detail.

features.name: Expert Cleaning Team
features.description: Our trained professionals use top-quality products and techniques for outstanding results.

features.name: Thorough & Reliable Service
features.description: We clean every corner meticulously, leaving your space fresh, sanitized, and inviting.

features.name: Customized Cleaning Plans
features.description: Flexible scheduling and personalized packages tailored to fit your unique needs and budget.

steps.title: 1. Request Your Free Quote
steps.description: Tell us about your residential or commercial cleaning needs — get a no-obligation estimate.

steps.title: 2. Schedule Your Service
steps.description: Choose the date and time that works best for you — we’ll fit into your schedule.

steps.title: 3. Enjoy a Spotless Space
steps.description: Our team arrives on time, uses eco-friendly products, and leaves your home or office sparkling clean.

about.title: About Us
about.description3: we provide professional cleaning services with dedication, attention to detail, and reliability. With years of experience serving residential and commercial clients in Sarasota, we are committed to creating spotless and healthy environments for your home or business. From deep cleans to regular maintenance, our team uses eco-friendly products and efficient techniques to ensure your satisfaction. Contact us today and see how we can transform your space with top-quality cleaning.

questions.q: How can I request a free quote?
questions.a: You can request a free quote by calling (941) 879-4806.
We proudly serve Sarasota and nearby areas. Contact us to confirm availability in your location.

questions.q: How much will I pay to hire a cleaner?
questions.a: Pricing varies based on the size of your space and the type of cleaning. Contact us for a personalized quote.
Same-day service may be available depending on the schedule. Please contact us to check availability.

questions.q: Do I have to be there during the cleaning?
questions.a: You don’t have to be present, but we recommend being available at the beginning or end to discuss any specifics.

questions.q: Do I need to provide the cleaning supplies?
questions.a: It’s optional! Most cleaners bring their own supplies. If you have preferences (e.g., no bleach or only organic products), please mention them in your request.

questions.q: What is the difference between a deep clean and a standard clean?
questions.a: A standard clean is regular maintenance. A deep clean is more thorough and targets hard-to-reach areas, like under appliances or behind furniture.

questions.q: How long does carpet cleaning take?
questions.a: It usually takes 1 to 3 hours per room. Drying time ranges from 6 to 12 hours, but it's not included in the service duration.

secondaryCTA.description: Professional cleaning that fits your schedule and leaves your space spotless — all at a fair price.

footer.subheading: We make your home or office shine with professional and reliable cleaning services.
